entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
